text: Apple will name a successor to Steve Dowling, former head of public relations at Apple
full-pick-text: Apple will name a successor to Steve Dowling, former head of public relations at Apple
notes:
• "Either named by Apple officially, or reported by more than one outlet that a person has been appointed."
  • Clearly in no hurry to do this, Apple finally hired Stella Low to the role in 2021.
